title: Carnal Sacraments: A Historical Novel of the Future
description: Futurist Faustian 2075. Jeffrey Cooper, Alabama-raised design superstar in Americanized Germany, is 78 but looks 40 years younger due to the perks of his stressful job. Meeting an impulsive, gifted man will destroy the life he has painfully built for himself, but allow him to reclaim his own soul.
author: Perry Brass
